column1: # "xtraores_mini" remix - contains almost everything from xtraores/xtraores, but not the other mods
# See also the "xtraores" remix which does contain items from the other mods, as well as from
# Cobalt, osmium, platinum and titanium have been renamed as fictional sybilline, ozymandium,
#       planexium and tritonium to avoid clashing with any code that wants the real-life metals
# The spelling of geminitinum has been tweaked to geminitium, because no-one can type it
# Does not include support for awards (yet)
